message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a sentiment analysis and key entity detection approach based on BERT for online financial text mining and public opinion analysis in social media. This involves natural language processing (NLP) techniques such as sentence matching and machine reading comprehension (MRC). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with NLP and information retrieval. The paper also involves machine learning techniques such as ensemble learning, which suggests sub-categories such as cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The focus on financial domain and public opinion analysis suggests sub-categories such as cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
